meanings.definition: The quality or state of being attracted to both sexes.
meanings.sent1: Her understanding of bisexualities helped her support her friends who identified as such.
meanings.sent2: Many people embrace their bisexualities and feel comfortable expressing their attractions openly.
meanings.sent3: Learning about different bisexualities made the class discussion on relationships more interesting.
meanings.sent4: The diversity of human experiences includes various bisexualities that enrich our society.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the concept of bisexualities can lead to greater acceptance and empathy towards others.

meanings.definition: The sexual orientation of being attracted to both men and women.
meanings.sent1: Understanding different bisexualities can help individuals feel more accepted and understood.
meanings.sent2: She openly discussed her bisexualities with her close friends and felt supported.
meanings.sent3: The sitcom humorously portrayed the misunderstandings that can arise from different bisexualities.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of complexities, embracing our own bisexualities can bring clarity and self-acceptance.
meanings.sent5: The character's journey to explore her own bisexualities was depicted with sensitivity and depth.
